name: cleaning-app
description: Modern cleaning agents management application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push

author: Cleaning App Team
